summary:
The University of Cambridge is a very old and famous university in England. It was started in 1209 when teachers left Oxford after a fight. Cambridge is one of the oldest universities still running. It has 31 colleges and many different subjects to study. The university has a big library with millions of books.

Many famous people went to Cambridge, like scientists (Charles Darwin, Isaac Newton), writers (Lord Byron, John Milton), and even a former U.S. president's son (John Harvard). The university has won lots of Nobel Prizes and has many successful alumni.
title: University of Cambridge
